text: 4.10: FG 2.24; 3.6; 3.13-16Nde maaŋ muuŋgip ne kaŋgir saŋv, nde zam khueŋ kaŋgiri, nde Isreriŋ, nde vhɨra za khueŋ kaŋgiri, kha suani mbatɨgi guma, ana Nasaret guma Zisas Krais zɨn panan, ana suani guigira nzerigim, ana ntigem nde nɨman khar thɨgi. Kha guma Zisas, ndera ana shogiap, ana ndim khanarareŋ ga tɨga fugim, ana rimgim, Fhe Bakɨme taagia ana khavgi.4.10 Mba buaadegi gumgira, mbe ŋgu gari guman pana vhari Pairat ga suaŋgim, ana Zisas shogim, ana rimgi. Ndu Ruk sapta 22.66 ganɨv, vhɨra sapta 23.5 ganɨri. Mbe Zisas shogim, ana rimgim, mbe khueŋ vuzvugi, mba gumgi gu mbigi, ana khothɨgɨ thari.
